se.sensiblethings.disseminationslayer.communication.security.encryption

Class AsymmetricEncryption

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.sensiblethings.disseminationslayer.communication.security.encryption.AsymmetricEncryption

  • public class AsymmetricEncryption
extends java.lang.Object
    AsymmetricEncryption.java The class implements all functions of asymmetric encryption, including the key pair generation, the key loading from the bytes, the encryption and decryption of the messages, and the out put of the message with hex format
    Author:
    Hao

    • Method Detail

      • generateKey

        public static java.security.KeyPair generateKey(java.lang.String algorithm,
                                int keyLength)
                                         throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Generate the key pair with specified algorithm, and key length, like ("RSA",1024)
        Parameters:
        algorithm - The asymmetric encryption algorithm
        keyLength - The key length corresponding to the asymmetric encryption
        Returns:
        The key pair (public and private key) corresponding to the algorithm
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • loadKey

        public java.security.Key loadKey(byte[] key,
                        java.lang.String type,
                        java.lang.String algorithm)
        Transform the key from bytes to corresponding instance
        Parameters:
        key - The key in bytes that will be transformed
        type - The key type : public key ? private key
        algorithm - The key applied in which algorithm
        Returns:
        The key transformed from the bytes

      • encrypt

        public static byte[] encrypt(java.security.PublicKey publicKey,
             byte[] data,
             java.lang.String algorithm)
        The encryption operation with specified algorithm
        Parameters:
        publicKey - The public key that used for this asymmetric encryption
        data - The source message that will be encrypt
        algorithm - The specified asymmetric encryption algorithm
        Returns:
        the cipher text

      • decrypt

        public static byte[] decrypt(java.security.PrivateKey privateKey,
             byte[] raw,
             java.lang.String algorithm)
        The decryption operation with specified algorithm
        Parameters:
        privateKey - The private key that used for this asymmetric encryption
        raw - The cipher text in bytes
        algorithm - The specified asymmetric decryption algorithm
        Returns:
        the plain text in bytes

      • toHexString

        public static java.lang.String toHexString(byte[] b)
        Transform the cipher text in bytes to one hex string
        Parameters:
        b - the bytes that will be transformed
        Returns:
        the corresponding hex string
